content.text: Hi, there! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you?
I'm doing alright! I'm just getting ready to head to work.
Oh, cool! What do you do for a living?
I work as a hotel night auditor, so I work from around 11 p.m. to 7 a.m.
Oh wow, that's a pretty late shift! How do you stay awake all night?
I drink a lot of coffee! Haha, but I also find that it's pretty easy to stay awake once I get into a routine.
That's good! I'm always impressed by people who can work night shifts. I'm not sure how I'd manage it!
It's definitely not for everyone! But I actually really like it. It's nice to have the whole place to myself most of the time.
That does sound pretty nice! I'm sure you get a lot of work done.
Yeah, I usually do! I also have a lot of time to read and watch movies.
That's awesome! I wish I had more time to do those things.
Me too! But I guess I'll just have to make the most of it when I can.
That's the spirit!
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a stay-at-home mom, so I take care of my two kids and run my own sewing business.
Oh, that's so cool! I love to sew, but I don't have much time for it anymore.
It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding. I love being able to make things for my family and friends.
That's awesome! I'm sure they appreciate it a lot.
They do! I love seeing their faces light up when they see something I've made for them.
That's so sweet! I'm sure you're a great mom.
Aww, thanks! I try my best
